title: Indian Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave
description: Fragment of cream-colored cotton, painted in design of detached flower sprays, alternating with flower head in profile; background sewn with very small design of flower head with stamens. Colors red, blue, violet, black for outlines. Glazed. No selvages.

tombstone.epitaph:
Indian Chintz, 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave. 1953-126-5.
